content: I'm interested in the Cook-Off for a Cause event on April 14th. I think it would be a fun way to get involved and support a local food pantry. Since I have experience with registration desks, I'd be happy to help with that part of the event as well. Also, I've been involved with a charity kitchen recently and learned some new cooking skills, so I might be able to lend a hand with the cooking part of the competition too.
